title: Adilene Garibay
text:
Welcome! This site serves as a digital portfolio for my graduate work product. Here, I document my journey through the Social Data Analytics and Research program, focusing on the intersection of data science, social patterns, and actionable insights.
About Me
I am a graduate student currently exploring the world of Knowledge Mining, NLP, and predictive modeling. My goal is to leverage data-driven methodologies to solve complex social problems.
Featured Coursework

Knowledge Mining
Exploring the DIKW hierarchy, neural extraction methods, and the “AI for Science” paradigm to transform raw data into actionable insights.


Data Collection Methods
Focusing on the systematic gathering of social data, survey design, and ensuring data integrity for robust research outcomes.


Data Visualization
Translating complex data sets into intuitive, high-impact visual narratives to aid in decision-making and public communication.
Contact

GitHub: AdileneGaribay
Email: dal661311@utdallas.edu


This website was developed as part of my graduate coursework. Technical assistance and structural guidance were provided by Gemini 1.5 Flash (LLM).
